beta.title: Tweeten Beta 3.3.3
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

We are releasing Tweeten 3.3.3 today with a couple of bug fixes:

  • Add New Column box displayed weird buttons, should be fixed now
  • Users using Tweeten's icons for Like/RT notifications had their formatting broken, should be fixed now

We are working hard on a major update for Tweeten, and we can't wait to share it with you in a few months! As usual, if you have any feedback, please let us know via Twitter (@tweetenapp). Happy Tweeting!
